C-Plus - Orange Soda - 24 x 500 ml

C’plus Orange Burst is a great tasting orange flavoured sparkling beverage. It contains just the right amount of Sunkist Juice® to deliver a refreshing fruity orange taste.
Contains 4% of Sunkist Juice® and natural flavour
A convenient size that can be consumed on its own or while entertaining family and friends
Best enjoyed chilled to experience the full refreshing burst of orange flavour.

entry.title: Crush - Orange Soda - 24 x 591 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crush
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 37.99

Crush -  Orange Soda - 24 x 591 ml

Crush offers an exciting rush of flavor and fun in every sip. As the original orange soda, Crush has a long history of delighting consumers with a wide range of crowd-pleasing fruity flavors. Available in Orange, Grape, Strawberry, Pineapple, Watermelon, Peach, and Diet Orange, Crush has enough variety for the whole family to enjoy.

Orange Crush* is like drinking a party, wrapped in a brilliant burst of orange flavour! This 24-pack of 591 mL is a convenient format to treat your taste buds-and your friends-to a tidal wave of taste.
• Intense burst of orange flavour
• The first in a family of fun flavours

entry.title: 7Up - Regular Soda - 24 x 591 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: 7 UP
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 37.99

7Up - Regular Soda - 24 x 591 ml

Get inspired to mix it up a little with 7UP! Crisp and refreshing, it mixes into all kinds of drinks, cocktails, punches, baked goods, and more.

7UP® is a refreshing lemon lime carbonated soft drink. It is a clear, caffeine free beverage made with real lemon and lime flavour. This 24-pack of 591ml bottle is perfect for sharing with friends and family.
• Refreshing lemon and lime flavours
• 100% Natural Flavours
• Caffeine Free

entry.title: Nestea - Lemon Zero Sugar Iced Tea - 12 x 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestea
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 21.99

Nestea - Lemon Zero Sugar Iced Tea - 12 x 500 ml
We’re not allowed to call this the best green tea ever, but you are!

Refreshingly different, our perfectly balanced blend of real green tea and natural lemon flavour is made with zero preservatives and contains tea polyphenols. Yes, that’s a good thing.
Real Tea, Real Refreshing: NESTEA is Canada's favourite Iced Tea brand. Available in single serve bottles deliciously blended with real green tea and lemon - perfect for refreshment when you're on the go! Naturally flavoured, no preservatives or artificial flavours.
  • Made with real tea
  • Deliciously blended with natural flavours.
  • No preservatives or added colours
  • Convenient package for when you're on-the-go.

entry.title: Grace - Island Soda Pineapple Drink - 2 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grace
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 4.69

Available as Grace Island Soda Pineapple - 9 x 2 LTR

Ingredients

Carbonated water, sugar / glucose-fructose, ginger extract, natural and artificial flavour, citric acid, sodium benzoate, colour

Pineapple - Grace Famous Island Soda! The bottle is new, the label is unique, but with the same taste you always enjoyed. Grace Soda has evolved to become the new Grace Famous Island Soda. Our roots are in the islands, our flavours are inspired by its people and now, with two new flavours and a unique twist, literally under the cap.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Coca-Cola
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 37.99

Coca-Cola - Diet - 24 x 500 ml

Diet Coke is the original sparkling beverage for those who want great flavour without the calories - a drink for those with great taste.
Bring home the bold crisp taste of Diet Coke.
Made with zero sugar and zero calories.
For a refreshing taste enjoy chilled.
Perfect size to be enjoyed with meals.

Because it's fizzing delicious. Diet Coke delivers a distinct, unique and lighter taste to Coca-Cola Classic.

it’s the one and only diet coke®. it’s your deliciously fizzy go-to companion. it might have a brand new look, but it’s the same calorie free diet coke® you know and love. when you need that delicious boost to unabashedly live your life…look no further.

entry.title: A&W - Root Beer 2 L - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: A & W
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 2.99

A & W - Root Beer - 2 L

The classic A&W Root Beer recipe was first created in 1919 using a blend of roots, bark and berries. Today, A&W Root Beer is still a blend of those delicious flavours. It’s the same creamy, frothy, refreshing beverage you’ve always loved.
Naturally caffeine-free.
Bring home the authentic, delicious, creamy taste of A&W Root Beer.
Enjoy it chilled in a frosty glass.

entry.title: Sprite - Regular 2 L - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sprite
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 2.99

Sprite - Regular - 2 L Plastic Bottle

It's quench time.With its clean, crisp, lemon-lime taste, Sprite quenches your thirst and helps you keep your cool. 

Enjoy the clear lemon-lime refreshment of Sprite with its crisp, clean, great taste. It quenches your thirst, and also pairs well with a variety of food, particularly with spicy food. It is made with 100% natural flavours, and has no colour and no caffeine.

Bring home the authentic, clear & refreshing lemon-lime flavour of Sprite.
Made with 100 % natural flavours, no caffeine and no preservatives so you get a full flavour in each sip.
For crisp, cold taste, enjoy chilled.
Convenient pack of 2L so you have plenty to enjoy.
